attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 2008: One Community, One Theatre....
By 2010: One Community, No Theatre

The London Borough of Waltham Forest is the only borough without a cinema and we are soon to be without a theatre. 
The council have plans to demolish the building as part of their £3.6 million bid to renovate Lloyds Park.
Lee & Nicky Caulfield have plans to save the theatre by extending the lease and also refurbishing the entire building to a very professional, broadway style standard for the community to use.

But We Need The Communitys Support!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save The Waltham Forest Theatre."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18932


Prime Minister's Office
